snippet.title: SERIAL EXPERIMENTS LAIN - 1998 PS1 Psychological Horror Game (+ Review in the Description)
snippet.description:
REVIEW of "LAIN" PS1 GAME: http://forbidden-siren.ru/index/serial_experiments_lain_ps1_game/0-272
COMPARISON of "LAIN" GAME and ANIME: http://forbidden-siren.ru/index/anime_serial_experiments_lain/0-274
About PC PORT of "LAIN" Game: http://forbidden-siren.ru/index/serial_experiments_lain_game_pc_version/0-350

You can read the articles in English through google translate:
https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=ru&tl=en&u=http://forbidden-siren.ru/index/serial_experiments_lain_ps1_game/0-272

In this video i'm showing a psychological horror game "Serial Experiments Lain". This is the original japanese version for Sony PlayStation 1.

Subscribe to my YouTube channel if you like horror games:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCapQtacQvWxhPx966O_kR4w

Also, recently in 2023 I made a new Telegram channel about horror games (in Russian and English).
Russian Telegram: https://t.me/s/horror_games_hell
English Telegram: https://t.me/s/horror_games_heaven
There I will be posting news, articles and videos about interesting and obscure games.
